plugin.name: cxf-client
plugin.author: Christian Oestreich
plugin.title: Cxf Client - Support for CXF and JAXB Soap Clients
plugin.description: \ Used for easily integrating existing or new cxf/jaxb web service client code with soap services. Also provides wsdl2java grails target to easily generate code into srv/java from configured cxf clients.
